description_en: Annual principal labour force statistics based, including employment, unemployment, and participation.
description_ms: Statistik tahunan utama berkaitan tenaga buruh, termasuk guna tenaga, pengangguran, dan penyertaan.
methodology_en: The Labour Force Survey (LFS) provides statistics on the labour force, employment and unemployment at national and state level, as well as across urban and rural areas. Data from this survey is published on a monthly, quarterly and annual basis. A comprehensive and systematic approach in data collection and processing has been maintained over a period of time in order to obtain comparable time series statistics.
methodology_ms: Survei Tenaga Buruh (STB) menyediakan statistik tenaga buruh, guna tenaga dan pengangguran di peringkat nasional dan negeri serta di kawasan bandar dan luar bandar. Data daripada survei ini diterbitkan secara bulanan, suku tahunan dan tahunan. Pendekatan yang lengkap dan sistematik dalam pengumpulan dan prosesan data dikekalkan dari semasa ke semasa untuk mendapatkan perbandingan statistik siri masa.
caveat_en: There is no data for 1991 and 1994 because the LFS was not conducted in those years. The sum of each category may not always equal to the totals shown in related tables because of independent rounding to one decimal place. However, the differences are not obvious.
caveat_ms: Tiada data bagi tahun 1991 dan 1994 kerana STB tidak dilaksanakan pada tahun berkenaan. Hasil tambah bagi sesuatu kategori mungkin tidak sentiasa sama dengan jumlah yang ditunjukkan dalam jadual yang berkaitan kerana pembundaran secara bebas kepada satu titik perpuluhan. Walau bagaimanapun, perbezaan ini tidak ketara.
publication_en: [Labour Force Report, December 2022](https://storage.googleapis.com/dosm-public-publications/monthly_2022-12_labour_force_en.pdf), the latest edition of the monthly labour force statistics published by DOSM. OpenDOSM also features a [dashboard on the labour force](https://open.dosm.gov.my/labour-market).
publication_ms: [Laporan Tenaga Buruh, Disember 2022](https://storage.googleapis.com/dosm-public-publications/monthly_2022-12_labour_force_bm.pdf), edisi terkini bagi statistik tenaga buruh bulanan yang diterbitkan oleh DOSM. OpenDOSM sendiri juga memaparkan [papan pemuka khas tentang tenaga buruh](https://open.dosm.gov.my/labour-market).

fields.name: date
fields.description_en: [Date] The date in YYYY-MM-DD format, with MM-DD set to -01-01 since the data is at annual frequency
fields.description_ms: [Tarikh] Tarikh harga berkuatkuasa, dalam format YYYY-MM-DD kerana data berfrekuensi tahunan

fields.name: u_rate
fields.description_en: [Float] Ratio of unemployed to labour force size
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Nisbah jumlah penganggur ke bilangan tenaga buruh

fields.name: p_rate
fields.description_en: [Float] Ratio of the labour force size to the working age population
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Nisbah jumlah tenaga buruh ke jumlah penduduk umur bekerja

fields.name: ep_ratio
fields.description_en: [Float] Ratio of the labour force size to the population
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Nisbah jumlah tenaga buruh ke jumlah penduduk

related_datasets.title_ms: Tajuk Dataset Berkaitan dalam Bahasa Malaysia
related_datasets.description_en: Description of the related dataset in English
related_datasets.description_ms: Penerangan dataset berkaitan dalam Bahasa Malaysia
